languages.text: Собственный молот Постижения, изрядный вельми, на прощение вручил ему настоятель Гектархиус в благодарность, хоть и скорбел, яко не обрел для монастыря защитника, и зрел дни кровавые впереди.

As a farewell token of gratitude — a fairly hefty token indeed — Prelate Hectarchius gifted the Rogue Trader his own Cognatine Hammer, much though he was downcast by his failure to find a protector for the monastery, and by the premonition of the bloodshed to come.
languages.original_text: Собственный молот Постижения, изрядный вельми, на прощение вручил ему настоятель Гектархиус в благодарность, хоть и скорбел, яко не обрел для монастыря защитника, и зрел дни кровавые впереди.

traits.locale_text: As a farewell token of gratitude – a fairly hefty token indeed – Prelate Hectarchius gifted the Rogue Trader his own Hammer of Epiphany, much though he was downcast by his failure to find a protector for the monastery, and by the premonition of the bloodshed to come.

As a farewell token of gratitude – a fairly hefty token indeed – Prelate Hectarchius gifted the Rogue Trader his own Hammer of Epiphany, much though he was downcast by his failure to find a protector for the monastery, and by the premonition of the bloodshed to come.

As a farewell token of gratitude — a fairly hefty token indeed — Prelate Hectarchius gifted the Rogue Trader his own Hammer of Epiphany, much though he was downcast by his failure to find a protector for the monastery, and by the premonition of the bloodshed to come.

As a farewell token of gratitude — a fairly hefty token indeed — Prelate Hectarchius gifted the Rogue Trader his own Hammer of Epiphany, much though he was downcast by his failure to find a protector for the monastery, and by the premonition of the bloodshed to come.

As a farewell token of gratitude — a fairly hefty token indeed — Prelate Hectarchius gifted the Rogue Trader his own Cognatine Hammer, much though he was downcast by his failure to find a protector for the monastery, and by the premonition of the bloodshed to come.

languages.text: Como muestra de gratitud al despedirse, y fue una muestra muy importante, el prelado Hectarchius regaló a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente su propio Martillo Cognático, a pesar de estar apesadumbrado por no haber encontrado a alguien que protegiera el monasterio y por el inminente baño de sangre.
languages.original_text: As a farewell token of gratitude — a fairly hefty token indeed — Prelate Hectarchius gifted the Rogue Trader his own Cognatine Hammer, much though he was downcast by his failure to find a protector for the monastery, and by the premonition of the bloodshed to come.

traits.locale_text: Como muestra de gratitud al despedirse, y fue una muestra muy importante, el prelado Hectarchius regaló a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente su propio Martillo Cognático, a pesar de estar apesadumbrado por no haber encontrado a alguien que protegiera el monasterio y por el inminente baño de sangre.

languages.text: 作为感谢，赫克塔奇乌斯教长送给行商浪人一份告别礼物——他自己的科尼亚蒂乌斯战锤。然而，教长却因未能为修道院找到庇护者而感到沮丧，也为所预见的即将到来的流血冲突而感到悲伤。
languages.original_text: As a farewell token of gratitude — a fairly hefty token indeed — Prelate Hectarchius gifted the Rogue Trader his own Cognatine Hammer, much though he was downcast by his failure to find a protector for the monastery, and by the premonition of the bloodshed to come.

traits.locale_text: 作为感谢，赫克塔奇乌斯教长送给行商浪人一份告别礼物——他自己的科尼亚蒂乌斯战锤。然而，教长却因未能为修道院找到庇护者而感到沮丧，也为所预见的即将到来的流血冲突而感到悲伤。

languages.text: 上級聖職者ヘクターキウスは、修道院のガーディアンを見つけられず、これから血が流れる予感に気落ちしていたものの、別れ際の感謝の印として、自由開拓者に自身のコグナティン・ハンマーを贈った…それはそれはズッシリと重い印だ。
languages.original_text: As a farewell token of gratitude — a fairly hefty token indeed — Prelate Hectarchius gifted the Rogue Trader his own Cognatine Hammer, much though he was downcast by his failure to find a protector for the monastery, and by the premonition of the bloodshed to come.

traits.locale_text: 上級聖職者ヘクターキウスは、修道院のガーディアンを見つけられず、これから血が流れる予感に気落ちしていたものの、別れ際の感謝の印として、自由開拓者に自身のコグナティン・ハンマーを贈った…それはそれはズッシリと重い印だ。

languages.text: Als Abschiedsgeschenk der Dankbarkeit – und es war ein großes Geschenk – übergab Prälat Hectarchius {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} seinen eigenen Kognaten-Hammer, obschon er niedergeschlagen war ob seines Versagens, einen Beschützer für das Kloster zu finden, und der Vorhersage kommenden Blutvergießens.
languages.original_text: As a farewell token of gratitude — a fairly hefty token indeed — Prelate Hectarchius gifted the Rogue Trader his own Cognatine Hammer, much though he was downcast by his failure to find a protector for the monastery, and by the premonition of the bloodshed to come.

traits.locale_text: Als Abschiedsgeschenk der Dankbarkeit – und es war ein großes Geschenk – übergab Prälat Hectarchius {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} seinen eigenen Kognaten-Hammer, obschon er niedergeschlagen war ob seines Versagens, einen Beschützer für das Kloster zu finden, und der Vorhersage kommenden Blutvergießens.

languages.text: En guide de remerciement et d'adieu, le prélat Hectarchius offre au {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} son propre marteau cognatien, malgré son amertume de n'avoir pas su trouver {mf|un protecteur|une protectrice} et craignant déjà l'effusion de sang à venir.
languages.original_text: As a farewell token of gratitude — a fairly hefty token indeed — Prelate Hectarchius gifted the Rogue Trader his own Cognatine Hammer, much though he was downcast by his failure to find a protector for the monastery, and by the premonition of the bloodshed to come.

traits.locale_text: En guide de remerciement et d'adieu, le prélat Hectarchius offre au {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} son propre marteau cognatien, malgré son amertume de n'avoir pas su trouver {mf|un protecteur|une protectrice} et craignant déjà l'effusion de sang à venir.

languages.text: Manastır için bir hami bulmaktaki başarısızlığı ve yakında akacağını öngördüğü kanlar nedeniyle kedere boğulmuş olan Piskopos Hectarchius, Hür Tacir'e bir veda armağanı olarak kendi Hısım Çekici'ni verdi. Bu gerçekten de muazzam bir armağandı.
languages.original_text: As a farewell token of gratitude — a fairly hefty token indeed — Prelate Hectarchius gifted the Rogue Trader his own Cognatine Hammer, much though he was downcast by his failure to find a protector for the monastery, and by the premonition of the bloodshed to come.

traits.locale_text: Manastır için bir hami bulmaktaki başarısızlığı ve yakında akacağını öngördüğü kanlar nedeniyle kedere boğulmuş olan Psikopos Hectarchius, Hür Tacir'e bir veda armağanı olarak kendi Hısım Çekici'ni verdi. Bu gerçekten de muazzam bir armağandı.
